1111100110000111 1101111110001110 0 -> sum: 1101100100010101, cout: 1
0100100010110011 0110011000000110 0 -> sum: 1010111010111001, cout: 0
1011110001001000 0000111101111100 1 -> sum: 1100101111000101, cout: 0
0011100011001110 0000110010101110 1 -> sum: 0100010101111101, cout: 0
0010011000100001 1001101001001110 0 -> sum: 1100000001101111, cout: 0
1010010111000101 1111101111011111 1 -> sum: 1010000110100101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
